name: QR Adventure
description:
Solve 5 mysterious QR-based puzzles to unlock the final super QR puzzle.  Scan the QR code generated in the final puzzle to unlock the prize.

The game has many readable QRs, all of which can be scanned using your smart device.

This is a unique interactive experience. You must have a QR reader to progress in the game, but that is the fun of playing  QR Adventure!
